Code Reviews with GerritÂ¶

Nova uses the Gerrit tool to review proposed code changes. The review site is http://review.openstack.org.

Gerrit is a complete replacement for Github pull requests. All Github pull requests to the Nova repository will be ignored.

See Gerrit Workflow Quick Reference for information about how to get started using Gerrit. See Development Workflow for more detailed documentation on how to work with Gerrit.
